December, 1946* to this office letter <0 I am tu !'!!f ITT , P>G-»24/6/A of the 19th September l%-6 regarding medical equipment and drugs for the Koweit Agency Dispensary and to enclose a copy of a letter dated . the l6th December from Messrs, Dakin Brothers Ltd, s' from which it will be observed that the order has now been completed i the balance of the goods having been dispatched for shipment per s, s, ‘’ARABISTAN' now trading at Milwall Docks, It is requested that the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf may be advised accordingly. LONDON, S.E.l, 0 O DeJjember, 1946. The High CiMi India Supply Coramission, 45/47, Mount Street, W.l. Dear Sir, Your Ref: PC.24/6 /a. We thank you for your letter of the 26th ult, regarding the order we had on hand for the Kuwait Agency Dispensary. We must apologise for not having answered you earlier, but we delayed the reply in order to make certain that the completion of this order, was despatched to the s.s. M Arabistarf now loading in the Millwall Docks for Kuwait. This last package has now been delivered for shipment, and this enables us to state that the valued order of the Kuwait Agency Dispensary, has now been completed. We are etc., Yours faithfully, for DAKIN BROS. Ltd., (Sgd.) P. E. England.i Affix gummed tab her* ' , '' 4 © THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR INDIA. r INDIA SUPPLY COMMISSION. U T I September, 1946 46 I am directed to refer to this Office letter I.SeC, P.G-.2i*/5/A of 8th July 1946 regarding medical equipment and drugs for the Koweit Agency Dispensary and to enclose a copy of a letter dated 17th September from Messrs. Dakin Brothers Ltd., London, in which is given the latest position on these orders. It is requested that you forward this information to the political Resident in the Persian Gulf. I am. Sir, Your obedient servant, £ k. ^Ju£j{L India Supply Commission. The Under-Secret ary of State for India, political Section, India Office, Whitehall, S.W.l.Affix jummed t»b her* Dakin Brothers Ltdo f ii4 - 50 Southwark Street, London, S.Eol* Tues* l?th Sept* 1946© Your Ref: H3-. 2k/5 FDG/MS I Ei JL . 1 1 4R The High Coinnissioner for India, India Supply Commission, 45/47 Mount Street, London, W.l. (D Dear Sir, We thank you for your letter of the 3rd instant regarding the order placed with us hy the Koweit Agency Dispensary* We are anticipating making a further despatch of the order by the s/s ”Ocean Wayfarer' which is sailing for Koweit towards the end of this month* We are sorry however, to say that this will not complete the order# We are still awaiting from the vvorks the delivery of a cabinet and at the moment of writing they cannot give a definite delivery date# However, you can rely upon us to do all we possibly can to expedite shipment. We trust that this information will be helpful to you# We are. Dear Sir, Yours faithfully, FOR DAKIN BROTHERS LIMITED. Sgd. F. D# Grafton#Affix gummed tab here $ !’ f •Fir«t fold here- Sender’s name and address:- ! I I I I pfO) pvooas-FDG/BS COPY L E T T 'fa. indexed i DAKIN BROTHERS LTD. | C7 (J UTholesale & Export DnI|^:ists , , and Manufacturing; Cheraists. A4,- 50, SOUTHWARK STREfT, S.E.l. W * ' .. 26 th June, 19b£>» ff): The Commissioner for India, India supply Commission, 4-5/47, Mount Street, London. T »V 0 1. Ref. PC 24/4/A Dear Sir, We thank you for your letter of the 21st inst. regarding the order for medical equipment and drugs, placed with us Ly the Kuwait Agency Dispensary. We are very pleased indeed to he ahle to report considerable progress, since our letter of the 30th April last. We have shipped by the S/S Samfleet, from London, four packages which consist of Surgical Dressings, Surgical Instruments, Enamelled Iron Ware, and Rubber Goods, also various Hospital Furniture, We have also despatched for shipment by the S/S Shahristan now loading in the Millwall Docks, London, a further four packages, all consisting of drugs, and chemicals. This means that the majority of the order, when the S/S Shahristan has sailed, will be en route to the dispensary. We are talcing all possible steps to have the balance ready for shipment as soon as possible. We trust that this information will be helpful to you. Yours faithfully, for DAKIN BROTHERS LTD.HLE copy Vl °-' THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR INDIAa INDIA SJJRPLY COMMISSION. ^ \' INDEXED ; 45/47 Mount Street, j 4 3 a i London > wl - Tel. s GROsvenor 4341 (5 lines). Our ref, I ,S.C« .P. I 4 -/ 5 /A V.. & rTTTHr 192 ^. I am directed to refer to this office letter I.S,C. P.0.24/3 dated 6th May 1946.regarding medical equipments and drugs for the Kuwait Agency Dispensary and to enclose a copy of a letter, dated 26th June from Messrs, Dakin Brothers Ltd.,London, in which is given the latest position with regard to these orders. It is requested that you forward this information to the Pblitical Resident in the Persian Gulf, I am. Sir, Your obedient servant, INDIA SUPPLY COMMISSION. The Under-Secretary of State for India, Political Section, India Office, Whit ehall, S.W.1,s> & PILE COPY THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR INDIA. INDIA SBPPLX COMMISSION;. Tel.: GROsvenor 4341. (5 lines). Sir, I am directed to forward to you copies of the marginally-noted correspondence regarding an order for medical equipment and drugs placed with Messrs*Dakin Bros* Ltd* by the Koweit Agency Dispensary. I am to request that you will inform the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf of the position v/ith regard to this order. Any further information regarding shipment and delivery of the goods will be passed to you as soon as it is received* Telegram No.A/35& dated 3o.46. frothy Political Agent/in the Persian Gulf. Letter P.G» 24/1 dated 18.3*4o» Messrs. Dahin Bros.Ltd. Letter SP/5M/881 and 924 dated 1 * 4 . 46 . from Messrs.Dakin Bros. Ltd. Letter P. G-. 24/2 dated 27*4*46. to Messrs. Dakin 3ros.i/&d. Letter RAB/AW dated 30* 4* 46. from Messrs. Dakin Bros. Ltd. I am. Sir, Your obedient servant. s. Department. VfQKD CODE TEL5G-RAJ1. jrom: Politico! Resident in the Persian Gulf. To. Secretary of State for India. Repeated to Political Agent Kov/eit (by post). Dated Bushire, o8.20 hours, 2nd March, 1946. ReccL 00.35 hours, March, 1946. V356^ An. order for medical equipment and drugs required by Kov/eit Agency Dispensary has been placed on Dakin Brothers, London. As they are urgently needed and consignments may be considerably delayed due to scarcity of shipping space, grateful if Stricks be asked to give priority. Y/eight is one ton.copy - India Supply jomr.d.ssio iij 45/7 Mount Street, London,W.> 18 th i larch, 194^* Ref:I.S.C. P.G.2V1* Gentlemen , I am directed to refer to an order for medical equipment and drugs placed with you 'by the Eoweit Agency Dj-spensary, and to inform you that a telegram has 'been received from the authorities in India stating that this material is very urgently required# I am therefore to request that you inform this Office of shipping registration number of the consignment in order that the goods may be called forward for sldpment as early as possible# I am, Gentlemen, Your obedient servant, (sgd) E# H# Gutcliffe. INDIA SUPPLY COMMISSION. Messrs# Dakin Bros.Ltd#, 46 Southwark Street, LONDON, S.E.1#- copy - Dakin Brothers L'd., LiU to 50 Southwark Street, London,S*E*1« Monday -4st April , EXT XP/EB/ 881 922^. The JS-gh CorairD-Ssioner fo^ India, India Supply Commission, 45/47 Mount Street, London, W* 1 • 32 /- ✓ £lC Dear Sir, Refoe# I, S* C» P*a>24/1* We acknowledge with thanks the receipt of your letter dated 18th March with reference to an order for medical equipment and drugs which we have for the Koweit Agency Dispensary. We are doing all possible to get this material ready and we will advise you of the shipping registration when we line up for shipment. Yours faithfully, for DAKIN BROTHERS LIMITED. (sgd.) E. PassmoreIndia Supply Commission, 45/7 iiount Street, London,, 7 . 1 , 322c JSS.C.P.C.24/2. Gentlemen, I am directed to letter of 1st April, regarding an order for medical equipment and drugs placed vdth you Ly the Koweit Agency Dispensary^ and to request that you inform this Office of the anticipated delivery date of these goods, so that this informa.tion may be passed to the authorities in India* I am. Gentlemen, Your obedient servant, (sgd.) E# H*Cutcliffe* INDIA SUPPLY COMMISSION. Me s sr s • Dalcin Bro s. Ltd. , hJ-i/50 South Street, London,S.E.1.- copy - DaJcin Brothers LtcU , 2^ to 50 Southwark Street, London, S*E*1o Tuesday, 30 th April,1946* RAI^/AWe India Supply Co raniss^i LIOLint Stre 3 t, <****. 522 c' f YouiJ ief.I.S.C.P.G* 24/2. Dear Sirs, In r4»pjL^--to..yq^r' l etter dated April 27 th we are glad to report that we have this order well in hand, having given it our urgent attention as soon as we received the copy order* Some of the goods are ready, and we will arrange to have these registered for shipment* Y/e cannot at this stage give any definite date for completion, as the order contains some sundry items, surgical instruments, etc* , not of our manufacture* We can assure you, hov/ever, that we are taking every possible 'step to urge these forward and vdll keep you informed of progress from time to time. Yours faithfully, for DAKIN MOTHERS LIMITED, (sgd. ) R.Aylmer Hall, DIRECTOR.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3228/46 'Medical Equipment and drugs for the Koweit Agency'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 21; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding an order of medical equipment and drugs being sent by Dakin Brothers Ltd to the dispensary of the Political Agency, Kuwait. As well as Dakin Brothers, the primary correspondents are: India Supply Commission; Political Resident, Persian Gulf; India Office.
